name: group_membership_created
definition: The event is emitted anytime a new member is added to a course group by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when a new user is added to a group.

schema.group_category_id: The Canvas id of the group category.
schema.group_category_name: The name of the group category.
schema.group_id: The Canvas id of the group the user is assigned to.
schema.group_membership_id: The Canvas id of the group membership.
schema.group_name: The name of the group the user is being assigned to.
schema.user_id: The Canvas id of the user being assigned to a group.
schema.workflow_state: The state of the group membership.

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
